search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Telzio (telzio.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official URL to the pricing page for Telzio is: [https://telzio.com/pricing](https://telzio.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
We value your privacy

We and our 1481 partners use cookies and other tracking technologies to improve your experience on our website. We may store and/or access information on a device and process personal data, such as your IP address and browsing data, for personalised advertising and content, advertising and content measurement, audience research and services development. Additionally, we may utilize precise geolocation data and identification through device scanning.

Please note that your consent will be valid across all our subdomains. Once you give consent, a floating button will appear at the bottom of your screen, allowing you to change or withdraw your consent at any time. We respect your choices and are committed to providing you with a transparent and secure browsing experience. Cookie Policy

WHERE AMBITIOUS
NONPROFITS
PLANT THEIR ROOTS
THE COST EFFECTIVE SOLUTION FOR NONPROFITS

Join the thousands of nonprofit organizations that use Telzio to stay connected to their communities. You can run everything from outreach and day-to-day operations, to telethons, hotlines, and phone banks on the Telzio platform.

A PHONE LINE FOR EVERY VOLUNTEER

With Telzio's scalable pricing model, you don't pay for individual users. This means that you can provide every member with the ability to make and receive calls, at no additional cost.

NONPROFIT DISCOUNTS

Reach out and see if your nonprofit qualifies for a 20% discount. The application process is fast and easy.

SCHEDULE DEMOVISIT TELZIO.ORG
Pick the model that fits your business

Different pricing models that both include all features and unlimited users.

BUNDLED MINUTES
Easy & Predictable
COMMITTED USE
Ultimate Flexibility
HOW IT WORKS
For small businesses with predictable usage

Bundle minutes and texts into a plan that gets shared across all users in your company. You don't have to worry about paying for users who rarely call, since there are no per-user fees.

Receive automatic alerts about your usage with plan recommendations, so you don't have to worry about overages.

Good for smaller teams that use less than 5,000 minutes per month.


WHAT'S INCLUDED
Users, extensions, & phone lines
Internal extension-to-extension calling
Voicemail-to-email & transcriptions
Call recording & storage
Number porting for 500k+ regions
Inbound SMS on local US phone numbers
Robocall blocking
Web & mobile apps
Customer support
100+ additional features
EXPLORE FEATURES
PLANS & PRICES
Local Number Plan

Flexible month-to-month plans for local phone numbers. Includes a bundle of minutes and text messages based on your usage. Minutes can be used for inbound calls from anywhere and outbound calls to United States, Canada, and Mexico. All incoming text messages on local US numbers are included at no charge. Unlimited extensions are included, and more phone numbers can be added for $1 per month.
‍
Explore Committed Use plans to bundle local and toll free usage.

Starting at $50/month

for 1,000 minutes and one local number.

‍+$1 per additional number

Receive automatic notifications about recommended plan changes, and modify plans anytime to avoid overages. Overages are charged at 0.15¢/min inbound and 0.30¢/min outbound.

Toll Free Number Plan

Flexible month-to-month plans for toll free phone numbers. Includes a bundle of minutes and text messages based on your usage. Minutes can be used for inbound calls from anywhere and outbound calls to United States, Canada, and Mexico. Unlimited extensions are included, and more toll free numbers can be added for $5 per month.

Explore Committed Use plans to bundle local and toll free usage.

Starting at $60/month

for 1,000 minutes and one toll free number.

‍+$5 per extra toll free number.

Get alerts to add more usage to your plan, and update them anytime to avoid overages. Overages are charged by 0.50¢/min inbound and 0.30¢/min outbound.

Texting Messaging

For local phone numbers, all incoming text messages are free of charge. For sending text messages from local numbers, bundles starting at 250 messages for $13. For texting on toll free numbers, pricing starts at 250 messages for $24, which includes both incoming and outgoing messages.

Free Inbound SMS

$0 for inbound texts to US and Canada.

All inbound text messages received on local phone numbers are included at no charge.

Internal Calling & Texting

Calling and text messaging internally between extensions is included. Internal calls do not count towards minutes when dialing extensions using Telzio phones and apps.

Free Internal Calling

Free users, and user-to-user calling.

Telzio Mobile & Web Apps

Use of the mobile app and the webphone are included. Immediate calling capabilities included from day one of your trial. Convenient way to get people up and running without any hardware or costs.

Web & Mobile Apps

The mobile app is free to download, and no installation is required for the webphone.

Optional Desk Phones

Desk phones can be purchased from our shop with full support starting at less than $100. Phones arrive ready-for-calling, and are easy to manage through the dashboard. You can also bring existing devices, and consult with our team about hardware solutions. Choose from sturdy, cordless phones to high-end, front-of-office reception phones. Browse options at our shop.

Desk Phones

Starting from $68 and arrives preconfigured.

Quality, reliable phones tested and recommended by our team.

Custom Caller ID Name

Registration of your business name as it appears in the caller ID on an incoming call, also known as CNAM. One-time setup fee of $15 to register your caller ID in the national databases.

$15 one-time

One-time setup fee to customize caller ID per phone number.

Registration of your physical location with local emergency telephone dispatch operations. Monthly fee of $1 per month per phone number.

911 Emergency Calling
$1/month

Monthly fee + local and government taxes and fees where applicable.

411 Directory Service

Registration of your business in the 411 directory.

$5/month

Monthly fee per phone number.

‍+$15 setup/change fee per number.

Outbound calls to the 411 directory service are charged at $1/minute.

See the Committed Use model for increased flexibility or Contact Sales for custom pricing.

Local and federal taxes and fees, including but not limited to the Universal Service Fund (USF) fees and USF Administrative Fees may apply in certain areas.

International Calling & Phone Numbers
GLOBAL CARRIER NETWORK

Consolidate your international phone numbers into one platform with Telzio, and manage them all from the same place. Through our worldwide carrier network, you can get new international numbers and keep your existing ones.

CALLING & TEXTING CAPABILITIES

Web and mobile apps enable outbound and inbound calling to and from 250+ countries - at local calling rates. Teams can work remotely and manage international phone calls from wherever they are.

Large call volume or
special project?

If you have a business with high usage or a special project, reach out to us for a custom pricing proposal. We'll go over your needs and design a package that fits.

CONTACT SALES
FAQs about small business phone systems
?
What are the terms?

You can choose from plans that are month-to-month, and you can also talk to your account manager about a custom plan. Our terms are flexible, and there are never any fees to port your phone numbers away.

?
What does "Committed Use" mean?

Committed Use is the minimum amount you agree to spend with Telzio each month, and it dictates your pricing based on volume. This type of arrangement is ideal for high calling or texting volume, large teams, unpredictable usage, and international packages.

?
Can I keep my existing phone numbers?

Yes. Existing phone numbers can be ported in to Telzio without any downtime or porting fees. Your free trial provides you with a phone number for configuration and testing, and our porting specialists and account managers are dedicated to ensuring a seamless switch.

?
What happens if we go over our minutes?

The system will automatically notify you once you've used up 90% of your minutes, so you can upgrade your plan if needed to avoid overages. Committed Use plans do not include a set amount of minutes and can also be updated anytime to accommodate changes in usage.

Get in touch

Talk to our sales team to get more information about pricing and obtain a cost estimate.

SCHEDULE DEMOTALK TO SALES
Request a quote

Go over your requirements with a specialist and receive a custom pricing proposal.

CONTACT SALES
Schedule a demo

Tour the platform, meet your account manager, and get your questions answered.
